Summary: White orb light approached, turned right, ascended at approx 12 degree angle and rapidly flew away.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Germantown
There were no other sightings in Germantown on or around September 17th 2012
divs: sighting detailsi was leaving my company's construction trailer heading to the jobsite. i noticed a white lighte moving toward me from the south. it sort of wobbled in its flight path so i stopped to watch it. the object was moving slowly and i wasn't getting paid to watch a light in the sky so i started to walk again to the job site. as i made it to the loading dock area of the building i was working in, the orb\light turned and was now flying in a more westerly direction and parralleling me as i walked. as i was watching the object move, i kept expecting to see the customary flashing blue and red strob lights that all aircraft have but none flashed. all aircraft lights that i have ever observed at night always changed in brightness or became non visible when the aircraft turned. the object i witnessed remained a solide white light, even as it turned. it now was flying parallel to me as i walked and i even mentioned to a coworker how strange it was to not see any strobing lights on this craft. as i entered the gate to the construction area and neared where i was to enter the building the light started to ascend at about a 12 degree angle and flew off at an incredible rate of speed. the light became just a very small pin point of light in a matter of about three to five seconds and then was gone. i was astonished by the smoothness of acceleration. it went from moving relatively slowly to gone in just a matter of seconds and it made no noise at any point in the flight. i told pretty much anybody that would listen about what i saw but most were uninterested.
